thread.title: President Donald Trump to Announce His Supreme Court Justice Pick: Watch the Livestream
thread.title_full: President Donald Trump to Announce His Supreme Court Justice Pick: Watch the Livestream

title: President Donald Trump to Announce His Supreme Court Justice Pick: Watch the Livestream
text:
PHOTOS: Donald Trump's Family: His Kids, Grandkids, Wives and More 
“I have made my decision on who I will nominate for The United States Supreme Court. It will be announced live on Tuesday at 8:00 P.M. (W.H.),” the business mogul, 70, tweeted on Monday from his personal account. President-elect Donald Trump speaks at a news conference at Trump Tower on January 11, 2017, in New York City. Spencer Platt/Getty Images 
The former Apprentice host is tasked with filling the vacancy left by the death of Antonin Scalia in February 2016. Trump has previously pledged to appoint a conservative, pro-life justice . According to The New York Times , Neil M. Gorsuch of the Denver-based 10th U.S. Circuit of Appeals and Thomas M. Hardiman of the Pittsburgh-based Third Circuit are the leading contenders. PHOTOS: Donald Trump's Inauguration Day, in Pictures 
“[My nominee is] a person who is unbelievably highly respected, and I think you will be very impressed with this person,” Trump said of his choice during a White House meeting on Monday. 
Former President Barack Obama previously nominated Merrick Garland for the job last year , but the nomination was blocked by the Republican majority in the Senate. The Republicans argued that due to the election year, the incoming president should pick Scalia’s replacement. PHOTOS: Donald Trump's Most Offensive and Outrageous Quotes Ranked 
Senate Democrats, such as Chuck Schumer , have already vowed to block Trump’s choice if necessary. The nominee will need a majority of the Senate to confirm the appointment. 
  Add a Comment
